about_the_game:
Fear The Timeloop offers a fresh take on the survival horror genre, combining elements of horror with time loop storytelling.

Sheriff James Cooper wakes up in an abandoned hospital, forced to die every fifteen minutes. The only person he can communicate with is police dispatcher Rose, for whom time moves normally. With her help, he tries to escape the trap set by his arch-enemy.

Explore the three-story hospital complex, solve puzzles, and fight enemies. Remember, every second brings you closer to death, which resets the cycle. Each new loop changes your strategy, requiring adaptation and creativity.

  • Prepare for the structure and appearance of the hospital to change with each new time loop cycle.

  • Use a variety of abilities to create your unique playstyle.

  • Explore, solve puzzles, and complete tasks to advance the story and earn rewards.

  • Learn about your past and the hospital complex through interactions with the police dispatcher.

  • Make decisions that will affect your character's fate.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may feature content unsuitable for all ages or inappropriate for viewing at work, including frequent violence, gore, and generally mature themes.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 / Intel Core i5-7500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 570 with 4GB VRAM / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti with 4GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Expected performance (on "Minimum" mode): 1080p/30 frames per second.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)/Windows 11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 / Intel Core i7 8700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 6600 / NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Expected performance: 1080p/60 frames per second.

short_description: Fear The Timeloop is a breath of fresh air for fans of the survival horror genre. Every fifteen minutes, the protagonist will die and return to the starting point. Are you ready to unravel the mystery of this timeloop and escape the eternal cycle of suffering?
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian, Czech, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
